title: Comment from American Citizen and Voter

analysis.key_quote: Civil service is meant to be nonpartisan to strengthen national security and serve the interests of the American people, not the whims of a wannabe tyrant nor the ideological machinations of a political party or extremist minoritarian group.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its undemocratic and unconstitutional nature, emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and the risks of politicization, which aligns with concerns about the integrity of the civil service system.
